resources.string: Map compass. Activate to reset the map rotation to North.
Attribution icon. Activate to show attribution dialog.
Location View. This shows your location on the map.
Showing a Map created with MapLibre. Scroll by dragging two fingers. Zoom by pinching two fingers.
